pages.text: $(li)Pumpkin Seeds can be plant in farmland to generate a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/pumpkin)Pumpkin$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be crafted placing a $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/pumpkin)Pumpkin$(/l) or $(l)Large Pumpkin Slice$() in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).

$(li)Pumpkin Seeds can be used to tame $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/parrot)Parrots$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/crow)Crows$(/l).$(br)$(li)You can use Pumpkin Seeds to craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/seed_pouch)Seed Pouch$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)Finally you can put Pumpkin Seeds in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/composter)Composter$(/l) to generate $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/bone_meal)Bone Meal$(/l).
